feed.title: ngkoksongofficial TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from ngkoksongofficial

entry.title: Opened up to Reginald and Dawn from @thefinancialcoconut to share the strategies and risks I took to safeguard Singapore's reserves and what I wish to champion for our nation. Beyond finance, I unveil the impact of my meditation practice on my leadership
entry.content: Opened up to Reginald and Dawn from @thefinancialcoconut to share the strategies and risks I took to safeguard Singapore's reserves and what I wish to champion for our nation. Beyond finance, I unveil the impact of my meditation practice on my leadership journey. Give it a listen on their platforms! #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: Love is the greatest gift I have received from life. My mother‚Äôs love inspired me to study hard and win a bursary so I would never see her cry again. My late wife Patricia taught me about unconditional love in our 33 years of marriage. When she passed, I
entry.content: Love is the greatest gift I have received from life. My mother‚Äôs love inspired me to study hard and win a bursary so I would never see her cry again. My late wife Patricia taught me about unconditional love in our 33 years of marriage. When she passed, I became a single dad. I learned more about love as I played the roles of mother and father to my youngest daughter. After 14 years of being single, Sybil walked into my life to bless me with newfound love. Thanks to her, I am still learning so much and I am thankful to have her as my equal partner in this journey. I want to give back to Singapore for all the love it has given me. It would be the greatest honour of my life. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #family #lovewins #nostalgia

entry.title: As President, I will work with the government for the people. The role of the president is not to make trouble for the government as it will render our nation dysfunctional. We must stay united for our future, while keeping the people at heart. #unitedfor
entry.content: As President, I will work with the government for the people. The role of the president is not to make trouble for the government as it will render our nation dysfunctional. We must stay united for our future, while keeping the people at heart. #unitedforourfuture #ngkoksong2023

entry.title: Singapore is a little red dot. But we are internationally recognised because of our exceptionalism in political and social stability! We cannot take these for granted. As President, I will use my experience to safeguard this stability. I want to honour o
entry.content: Singapore is a little red dot. But we are internationally recognised because of our exceptionalism in political and social stability! We cannot take these for granted. As President, I will use my experience to safeguard this stability. I want to honour our founding fathers and the Merdeka generation ‚Äî people who have built Singapore for all our future generations. We must not let what we built up be squandered. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #singapore #singaporetiktok #leekuanyew

entry.title: Blessed Nomination Day everyone! Sybil usually prepares toast but today is extraordinary - I got a croissant! ü•ê Also, keeping up with my daily discipline of meditation to prepare me for this significant day. Even Max knows it's special! üêà #ngkoksong2023 #
entry.content: Blessed Nomination Day everyone! Sybil usually prepares toast but today is extraordinary - I got a croissant! ü•ê Also, keeping up with my daily discipline of meditation to prepare me for this significant day. Even Max knows it's special! üêà #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: Last Saturday, I had the opportunity to have a discussion with these change-makers from the creative scene. They are all accomplished in their own fields and shared their thoughts on the future of our arts scene. I am determined to encourage our youths t
entry.content: Last Saturday, I had the opportunity to have a discussion with these change-makers from the creative scene. They are all accomplished in their own fields and shared their thoughts on the future of our arts scene. I am determined to encourage our youths to step into their passions without any fear of security or stability. I was so happy to have had this intimate session with them. I want to do more of these! #unitedforourfuture #ngkoksong2023

entry.title: I am standing to be your president to protect our three treasures. I will ensure we are united for our future so that Singapore continues to be a beacon of light for the world. We might be of different races ‚Äî Chinese, Malay, Indian, Eurasian & Others. Bu
entry.content: I am standing to be your president to protect our three treasures. I will ensure we are united for our future so that Singapore continues to be a beacon of light for the world. We might be of different races ‚Äî Chinese, Malay, Indian, Eurasian & Others. But we are all Singaporeans. Let us remember our common ground. #unitedforourfuture #ngkoksong2023

entry.title: I am an independent candidate. I stepped up for the presidency because I want to give Singaporeans a choice. I have never been a part of any political party or the governing party. We need to consider that the ‚Äòestablishment‚Äô covers a very wide spectrum.
entry.content: I am an independent candidate. I stepped up for the presidency because I want to give Singaporeans a choice. I have never been a part of any political party or the governing party. We need to consider that the ‚Äòestablishment‚Äô covers a very wide spectrum. Religious and civic organisations are also part of the establishment. I have the competence and experience to be a stabilising check to the government. I want to work with the government for the people. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: To safeguard the reserves of Singapore, you must have the right competence to make a good judgment call. From my years of experience at MAS and GIC, I know how the global financial system works. Being in the public sector for almost all my life, I am also
entry.content: To safeguard the reserves of Singapore, you must have the right competence to make a good judgment call. From my years of experience at MAS and GIC, I know how the global financial system works. Being in the public sector for almost all my life, I am also aware of who has the right character to be given key appointments. I will use all of my experience to safeguard our stability. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: When I was still in the public service, There was also little risk of a bad government. I was happy in my dream job. Serving the people of Singapore, by growing our reserves strategically was meaningful work. At that stage of my life, that was the best wa
entry.content: When I was still in the public service, There was also little risk of a bad government. I was happy in my dream job. Serving the people of Singapore, by growing our reserves strategically was meaningful work. At that stage of my life, that was the best way I could contribute to Singapore. Now I want to safeguard the reserves I have helped to grow. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture
